data.meta_site_name: The Jaws Log Audiobook Free Audible | Carl Gottlieb
data.text:
Description

Get ready to dive into the deep and thrilling world of the making of a classic. Carl Gottlieb's The Jaws Log takes readers behind the scenes of one of the most iconic and groundbreaking films in cinematic history. As the screenwriter of the film, Gottlieb provides an intimate and detailed account of the production process, from the initial idea to the final cut. This book is a treasure trove of anecdotes, insights, and revelations that shed light on the creative genius, technical challenges, and sheer determination that went into bringing the terrifying great white shark to life on the silver screen. Through Gottlieb's keen eye and sharp wit, readers are treated to a firsthand account of the highs and lows, the triumphs and tribulations, of making Jaws. From the casting to the special effects, from the on-set tensions to the off-screen camaraderie, The Jaws Log immerses readers in the world of filmmaking like never before. Whether you're a die-hard fan of the film or a casual movie enthusiast, this book provides a fascinating look at the art and craft of filmmaking, as well as the cultural impact of a film that forever changed the way we look at the ocean. So grab your copy, and prepare to be enthralled by the gripping narrative that is The Jaws Log â€“ a must-read for anyone who wants to understand the magic and the madness behind the making of a masterpiece.

Summary Audiobook Chapter List

Author :Carl Gottlieb

Carl Gottlieb is an accomplished screenwriter, actor, and director, best known for his work on the script for the iconic film Jaws. Born in New York City, Gottlieb began his career as a writer and performer in the improvisational theater group The Committee before moving on to work in film and television. In addition to his work on Jaws, Gottlieb has written and co-written numerous other films and television shows, earning accolades for his contributions to the entertainment industry. His memoir, The Jaws Log, provides a behind-the-scenes look at the making of Jaws and his experiences working with director Steven Spielberg and the rest of the cast and crew, offering a unique and insightful perspective on the creation of this landmark film.
